mapper.select: select b.b_code, i.img_img, img_cnt, nvl(g_cnt, 0) g_cnt, nvl(cm_cnt, 0) cm_cnt from(select b.b_code, min(img_code) img_code from board b join img i on b.b_code = i.b_code group by b.b_code )b join img i on b.img_code = i.img_code join (select distinct b.b_code, count(img_code) img_cnt from board b join img i on b.b_code = i.b_code group by b.b_code) im on b.b_code = im.b_code left join (select count(g_code) g_cnt, b_code from good group by b_code) g on g.b_code = b.b_code left join (select count(cm_code) cm_cnt, b_code from comm group by b_code) c on c.b_code = b.b_code order by ${value}
select c.cm_content, c.cm_date, m.m_id, c.cm_code, pm_id, m_picture from comm c join member m on c.m_code = m.m_code where c.b_code = #{ b_code } and c.cm_group = 0 order by c.cm_group, c.cm_date

select m.m_id, b_content, m.m_name, b.b_regdate, g_cnt, m_picture from board b join member m on b.m_code = m.m_code , (select count(g_code) g_cnt from good where b_code = #{ b_code }) where b_code = #{ b_code }
select cm_content, cm_date, m.m_id, m.m_picture, pm_id from comm c join member m on c.m_code = m.m_code where cm_group = #{ cm_group } order by cm_date
mapper.insert: insert into comm values(seq_comm.nextval, #{ content }, sysdate, #{ cm_group }, #{ b_code }, #{ m_code }, #{ pm_id })
